definitions.definition: Caring about oneself and the gratification of one's own desires rather than others; selfish .
Egotistical ( tending to talk excessively about oneself ) .
labels: by confusion of the similar words
definitions.label_groups: nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words

main_definition: Caring about oneself and the gratification of one's own desires rather than others; selfish .
secondary_definitions: ( nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words ) Egotistical ( tending to talk excessively about oneself ) .
